text: Allah ettakaiyavan enral avan tan vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum pataittu vanattiliruntu malaiyaiyum poliyac ceytu ataik kontu kanivarkkankalaiyum unkalukku - akaramaka velippatuttit tan kattalaiyinal katalil cellumaru kappalai unkalukku vacappatuttik kotuttum, arukalaiyum unkalukku vacappatuttittantan
